amendatorysection.catchline: Direct service contractor; powers and duties.
amendatorysection.para: (1) May apply to the department for a grant pursuant to section 81-2281;
(2) Shall recruit, select, train, and assign staff and senior companion volunteers;
(3) Shall provide for supervision of senior companion volunteers;
(4) Shall provide or arrange for meals and transportation for senior companion volunteers if funds are available; and
(5) Shall maintain a systematic means of capturing and reporting all program data required by the department.
